AgentControl

public AgentControl()
Method Detail

initTimeControl

public int initTimeControl(java.lang.String agentId)
Allow adversary to specify the time of initiation of a given agent ID Note: A returning time MUST be more than a current time, otherwise a current time will be returned

arrivalControl

public abstract BlockFlag arrivalControl(java.lang.String agentId,
                                         java.lang.String edgeId,
                                         java.lang.String nodeId)
Allow adversary to control and manipulate actions of a node before a message arrives at the node. Also allows the adversary to override any blocking/unblocking that may occur to the message at the node Note: It is adversary duty to make sure any blocked message will be unblocked

Parameters:
agentId - An ID of an agent that arrives
edgeId - An ID of an edge that agent is traveling
nodeId - An ID of a destination node
Returns:
BlockFlag.PASS if this agent must arrive now, BlockFlag.BLOCK if the agent has to be blocked, BlockFlag.DEFAULT no overriding

arrivalTimeControl

public int arrivalTimeControl(java.lang.String agentId,
                              java.lang.String edgeId,
                              java.lang.String nodeId)
Allow adversary to configure an arrival time of agent to a destination before it enters an edge Note: A returning time MUST be more than a current time, otherwise a current time + 1 will be returned.

Parameters:
agentId - An ID of agent that is entering
edgeId - An ID of a link that will be used by agent
nodeId - An ID of a node destination of a agent
Returns:
A simulation time that the agent will be arrived at the node

dropControl

public boolean dropControl(java.lang.String agentId,
                           java.lang.String edgeId,
                           java.lang.String nodeId)
Allow adversary to configure the lost of agent that will traveling on an edge to a node. This drop will be determined right after the agent entered the edge

Parameters:
agentId - An ID of agent
edgeId - An ID of a link that agent is traveling through
nodeId - An ID of a destination node of the agent
Returns:
True if the agent will die before arrive at a node, otherwise false

getTravelingAgents

public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getTravelingAgents(java.lang.String edgeId,
                                                                                  java.lang.String nodeId)
Get a list of agents(with expected arrival time) currently in a link and heading to a given destination node

Parameters:
edgeId - An ID of a link
nodeId - An ID of a destination node
Returns:
a list of agents with expected arrival time if exist, otherwise empty list is returned

blockAgent

public final void blockAgent(java.lang.String agentId,
                             java.lang.String incomingPort,
                             java.lang.String nodeId)
Allow adversary to block a given agent at a given port of a node

Parameters:
agentId - An ID of agent that want to block
incomingPort - A port that want to block
nodeId - An ID of a node that wants to block

unblockAgent

public final void unblockAgent(java.lang.String agentId,
                               java.lang.String incomingPort,
                               java.lang.String nodeId)
Allow adversary to unblock an agent at given port and node.

Parameters:
agentId - An ID of agent that want to unblock
incomingPort - A port that want to unblock
nodeId - An ID of a node that wants to unblock

isAgentBlocked

public final boolean isAgentBlocked(java.lang.String agentId,
                                    java.lang.String incomingPort,
                                    java.lang.String nodeId)
Check whether a given agent is blocked at a given port and node

Parameters:
agentId - An ID of agent
incomingPort - An incoming port of the node
nodeId - An ID of a node that is checking
Returns:
True if the port exists and it blocks arrival agent with a given ID, otherwise false

getTotalAliveAgent

public final int getTotalAliveAgent()
Count current number of agent that has been initiated and still alive in the environment

Returns:
a number of agent that is alive and has been initiated
